prodNameC: 邦迪斯人類抗核抗體篩檢免疫分析套組
prodNameE: THE BINDING SITE BINDAZYME ANA SCREEN Enzyme Immunoassay kit
ingredientsDesc:
？	ANA Coated Well: 12 x 8 well strips coated with a mixture of purified antigens (dsDNA, histone, SSA/Ro (60 and 52Kd), SSB/La, Sm, Sm/RNP, Scl-70, Jo-1, centemeric Antigen).
？	Type III Wash Buffer 20x concentrate: 1 bottle containing 50 mL of a 20x concentrated buffer for washing the wells.
？	Type III Sample Diluent: 2 bottles containing 50 mL of buffer for diluting the samples. Ready to use.
？	ANA Screen Cut-off Control: 1 bottle containing 1.8 mL of duluted stabilized human serum. The expected ANA result is given on the QC certificate. Ready to use.
？	ANA Screen Positive Control: 1 bottle containing 1.8 mL of duluted stabilized human serum. The expected ANA result is given on the QC certificate. Ready to use.
？	ANA Negative Control: 1 bottle containing 1.8 mL of duluted stabilized human serum. The expected ANA result is given on the QC certificate. Ready to use.
？	ANA Screen Conjugate: 1 bottle containing 12 mL of peroxidase labelled antibody to human IgG. Coloured red, ready to use.
？	TMB Substrate
applicantName: 太暘生物科技股份有限公司
applicantAddr: 新北市汐止區康寧街169巷25號13樓
efficacy: 用於體外監測人類血清中專一性抗核抗體(ANAs)的IgG抗體。
